scripts.copy-dompurify: npm run copy-dependency -- --name dompurify --dest-root chat --src-root dist --filter purify.es.mjs;purify.es.mjs.map
scripts.copy-marked: npm run copy-dependency -- --name marked --dest-root chat --src-root lib --filter marked.esm.js;marked.esm.js.map
scripts.copy-tailwindcss: npm run copy-dependency -- --name tailwindcss --dest-root chat --filter preflight.css
scripts.copy-pdfjs: npm run copy-dependency -- --name pdfjs-dist --dest-root chat --src-root web --filter images/;pdf_viewer.css;pdf_viewer.html;pdf_viewer.mjs;pdf_viewer.mjs.map
